name: Ch.7BaseConvo3
_source: speak;Moulder;Correct.|I was told to deliver to you this package that came from town.
speak;Lute;Ah, perfect.|I got a great deal on this book, so I'm glad they actually it delivered to me.|It is quite rare for a store to go out of their way for one customer.
speak;Moulder;Indeed, I was surprised myself.|Usually, they only do that for me if it's medical supplies for emergencies.
speak;Lute;Thus, I'm especially appreciative of this good fortune!.
speak;Lute;You sound worried.|It's fine, a genius like myself can handle it.
speak;Moulder;I hope so, for your sake.|In my lifetime, I've more than seen how dark forces can tempt the souls of good men...
speak;Lute;You worry too much..|I can handle any power that comes my way, dark or otherwise.
speak;Moulder;Artur told me how talented you are.|He wouldn't want anything bad to happen to you, so please keep him in mind.
speak;Lute;You... You're quite right...|He is very much the type to worry...
speak;Moulder;Blessings upon you child.|I pray for a bright future for you.
